titleStmt.title: Daily devotions, consisting of thanksgivings, confessions, and prayers in two parts ... / by an humble penitent.
titleStmt.author: Hopton, Susanna, 1627-1709.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Maxwell for Jonathan Edwin ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by S. Hopton. Cf. BM.
Signature A5 is torn and page 157 has faded print in filmed copy. Pages from beginning-15 and pages 140-end of book photographed from British Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
